text:
Visited the newly renovated outlet at fusionpolis on a Saturday afternoon which closes at 8pm.

Nicely space out seating which cater to different group size, solo eating, couple or family. Brightly lighted brings a cheery mood to diners.

We shared a carbonara added to a soup set consist of mushroom soup w 3 garlic toast and a soft drink.

Rina was really good with her service. All the staff were very attentive. Managed the crowd well despite the 1-1 promotion.  overall, good upgrade to the outlet :) Also got to eat my fave pasta that i've been having since i was in secondary school!

Just reopened and experience was great! revamp of store was much more accommodating. Favourite pasta here is the cheesy crumble ham, beef meatballs, and chicken sausage. All tasted pretty good. Rina was friendly and bright!

Rina and colleagues are extremely great and provided excellent service. Food and new decor is amazing. Hope they keep up the excellent standards. Would recommend a visit.

Seafood zuppa was exceptional.

The atmosphere is so vibrant and nice. Rina is so approachable and asking if there is any feedback to improve.

I ordered the Chicken Bacon Aglio - the taste is just nice and not so salty.
